alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT YAVAPAI COUNTY NORTHWEST OF CAMP VERDE THROUGH 700 PM MST... At 629 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Highway 260 near Middle Verde, or just northwest of Camp Verde, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Camp Verde, Bignotti, Aultman, Middle Verde, Jordan, Hayfield Draw OHV Area, Mcguireville, McGuireville, Montezuma Castle N.M., and Tissaw Trailhead. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 289 and 293. State Route 260 between mile markers 210 and 218. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
